senses.sense_definition: An official person who carries out the capital punishment of a criminal.

examples.text: The <w>executioner</w> wore a black mask to conceal his identity from the crowd.
In medieval times, the public <w>executioner</w> was a feared figure in society.

senses.sense_definition: A hit man, especially one working for a criminal organization.

examples.text: The police identified him as a notorious <w>executioner</w> for the local cartel.
He acted as a gang <w>executioner</w> to eliminate rivals.

senses.sense_definition: A person who performs or carries out a specific task or duty.

examples.text: She was the efficient <w>executioner</w> of the director's complex vision.
He served as the faithful <w>executioner</w> of the committee's final decision.
